__e: Well, I love the ring, Leo, but it just... It doesn't go with my life now.
Look, I love the guy to death, but I'm far and away the best-looking woman he's ever gonna get and I'm only a 7, so, come on.
I mean, he's my boy and I love him, but he's just, you know...
You know, I'm very very fond of that boy.
As much as I adore him, it's only a matter of time before he brings this place to its knees.
